product.longDescription: Ideal for farmers' markets and specialty sales. Tall, vigorous plants grow quickly, especially for a Lacinato type. Exhibits some variability in depth of color and leaf shape. Our thanks to Hank Keogh who bred Dazzling Blue in Oregon in association with Wild Garden Seed. Lacinato type kale is also known as "dinosaur" kale. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 120,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 100 seeds.
